reviewText: When I flew over Greenland on my way home from Iceland I looked down from the plane and wondered what life must be like in that starkly beautiful landscape. In this fascinating documentary, the filmmaker joins Greenlanders on their hunting excursions over the ice, and captures interesting glimpses into their culture as well as astounding vistas of the Greenland that very very few ever see. If you are interested in travel, adventure, or the arctic, this film is one of the few out there that hits the ice running.
